name: ListMeetingSummaries
description:
Retrieve meeting and webinar summaries for an account.

Use this tool to get a list of all meeting or webinar summaries available for a Zoom account. This requires the host to have an appropriate subscription and settings enabled. Note: End-to-End Encrypted meetings do not support summaries.

parameters.name: number_of_records_per_call
parameters.description: Specify the number of summaries to return in one API call. This controls the page size.

value_schema.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: pagination_next_page_token
parameters.description: Token to paginate through large result sets. Expires in 15 minutes.

value_schema.description: Use the next page token to paginate through a large set of results. The next page token returns whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. This token's expiration period is 15 minutes.

parameters.name: start_date_utc
parameters.description: The start date in UTC format (`yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'`) to filter meeting summaries by creation date.

value_schema.description: The start date, in `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'` UTC format, used to retrieve the meeting summaries' creation date range.

parameters.name: end_date_utc
parameters.description: The end date in `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'` UTC format to retrieve meeting summaries within this date range.

value_schema.description: The end date, in `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'` UTC format, used to retrieve the meeting summaries' creation date range.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Zoom API.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

value_schema.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: Use the next page token to paginate through a large set of results. The next page token returns whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. This token's expiration period is 15 minutes.

value_schema.description: Use the next page token to paginate through a large set of results. The next page token returns whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. This token's expiration period is 15 minutes.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The start date, in `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'` UTC format, used to retrieve the meeting summaries' creation date range.

value_schema.description: The start date, in `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'` UTC format, used to retrieve the meeting summaries' creation date range.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The end date, in `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'` UTC format, used to retrieve the meeting summaries' creation date range.

value_schema.description: The end date, in `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'` UTC format, used to retrieve the meeting summaries' creation date range.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
